page.title: 10HOMELIFE IN MYDDLE
page.content: {PETS There are a lot of{pets}in{Myddle,} for example birds,cats,dogs,fish and hamsters.The most popular {pets}are dogs and the most unpopular{pets}are birds.There are a few stray cats and dogs roaming around the{village}but they soon get caught and taken to the the kennels. {FOOD Lots of people in{Myddle}grow their own{vegetables}like carrots potatoes, lettuce and many more.Most people get the rest of their{food}at Tesco super store in Shrewsbury. {JOBS The mum has the most {work}to do in the house,washing up,cooking,ironing, hoovering and many more{jobs.}The dad has to look after the garden and mend things and do many more{jobs.} {Thats Homelife.
